message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
You're being too generous, let's be realistic
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more given the initial 50/50 proposal. Your turn!
You're still too high, I'm the one taking the inflation hit
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think 60/40 is the minimum I'm willing to accept. Let's meet in the middle!
You're not budging, I'll try to squeeze a bit more
I'm willing to make a small concession, but I think 65/35 is the minimum I'm willing to accept. Don't squeeze me too hard, Bob!
You're getting desperate, I'll take advantage of it
I'm not desperate, I'm just being realistic. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, Bob!
You're bluffing, I'll call your bluff
I'm not bluffing, I'm serious. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, Bob. We're running out of time!
Fine, I'll take what's left, you can have the scraps
